planet.name: Kepler-65 b
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Chaplin et al. 2013. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Chaplin et al. 2013 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

planet.description: This planet was discovered by Chaplin et al. 2013. The discovery was made with a space based telescope (0.95 m Kepler Telescope). The parameters listed here are those reported by Chaplin et al. 2013 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.

planet.name: Kepler-65 e
planet.description: This planet was discovered by Mills et al. 2019. This was a ground based discovery. The parameters listed here are those reported by Mills et al. 2019 and were imported into the Open Exoplanet Catalogue from the NASA Exoplanet Archive.
